value:
$WmMPID_双界ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_FF_Pair,Face|We won't lose this time!$k$p$nMPID_仮面ルキナ|For shaved ice!$k$p$WmMPID_水着キルロイ,ch09_16_Kilroy_M_Swim20,Face|For a warm summer memory!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Swim20,Face|This is it. The final battle. Let's
make it a comeback to remember!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Swim20,Face|These battle conditions are rather
odd, but an exemplary soldier like
myself isn't going to lose!$k$p$WmMPID_水着セライナ,ch08_19_Celina_F_Swim20,Face|This may be some exhibition match,
but I'm not throwing it. Prepare to
get sunk.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_水着ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Swim20,Face|Lute? Are you just sitting there
staring out at nothing?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Swim20,Face|Hm? Oh, I was just thinking of our
conversation earlier.$k$pShe didn't say it outright, but since
I'm a genius, I recognized the truth
behind the words.$k$pHer home is not her only source of
regret. She knows she's done bad
things, but she can't change now.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Swim20,Face|...Yeah. That's war, though, right?$k$pShe couldn't have gone against the
ruling powers without risking her
life—or her family's.$k$pIt's like you said, if you have people
you want to protect, it can be both
a strength and a weakness.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Swim20,Face|If rulers can't make good decisions,
then their people will suffer. Always.$k$pEveryone would be better off if the
Grado Empire collapsed.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Swim20,Face|Harsh... But I'm betting Selena
is gonna want to defend her home
no matter what.$k$pI mean, I'm sure there's more
to it than that. But that's what
my gut says...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Swim20,Face|Then our time sharing a path will
be short. Once this summer retreat
ends, we will be enemies again.$k$p...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Swim20,Face|...Something wrong?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Swim20,Face|...I felt a twinge. In my chest.
But...I'm in peak physical condition.
It must have been a hiccup.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Swim20,Face|Uh... Yeah. I bet you're right...$k$p$Sbs150|
